item.title: Teddy in Sweden
item.description: Teddy in Sweden # Some picture taken all the way up in northern Sweden: Those picture were taken mid-June. That means what looks like Teddy sitting in the afternoon sun actually was taken 20min before midnight some 40km south of the arctic circle at Camp Frevis√∂ren - an incredible spot to start the day on a canoo: View Larger Map (That little half-isle that stretches into the ocean.) If you ever travel that far north, make sure to stop by at Hulkoff.
